Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/hcat

Function Figure hcat(Figures figs, FProperty props...)
Description Horizontal composition of a list of figures. By default, horizontal composition is vertically centered but all vertical alignment properties can overrule this.

When a horizontal gap property is available, this will be used as gap between the figures.
Examples 
b1 = box(size(50,100), fillColor("Red"));
b2 = box(size(80,20), fillColor("Blue"));
render(hcat([b1, b2]));
gives: 

b1 = box(size(50,100), fillColor("Red"));
b2 = box(size(80,20), fillColor("Blue"));
render(hcat([b1, b2], top()));
gives: 

b1 = box(size(50,100), fillColor("Red"));
b2 = box(size(80,20), fillColor("Blue"));
render(hcat([b1, b2], bottom()));
gives: 

b1 = box(size(50,100), fillColor("Red"));
b2 = box(size(80,20), fillColor("Blue"));
b3 = box(size(80,20), fillColor("Yellow"));
render(hcat([b1, b2, b3], bottom(), hgap(10)));
gives:
